channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ilhan Omar says Trump attacks on Somali immigrants 'deflect attention' from scrutiny
item.description: NPR's Michel Martin speaks with Rep. Ilhan Omar, D-Minn., who came to the U.S. from Somalia, about President Trump's tirade against Somali immigrants.

item.title: FBI arrests suspect in investigation into pipe bombs planted near DNC, RNC before Jan. 6 attack
item.description: The FBI has spent years searching for the person who put bombs near the Democratic and Republican committee headquarters, hours before the assault on ...

item.title: Vern Yip's secret to better home decor? Stop scrolling for inspiration
item.description: In the digital age, it's easy to curate the look of your home with the help of artificial intelligence and social media. But designer Vern Yip would l...

item.title: This High Arctic rhino may change what we know about ancient animal migrations
item.description: A 23-million-year-old rhinoceros fossil is reshaping scientists' understanding of mammal evolution.

item.title: Trump attacks Somali immigrants. And, CDC to address vaccine schedule for kids
item.description: Trump is targeting Somalis with racist remarks ahead of expected immigration enforcement activity in Minnesota. And, a CDC advisory panel will revisit...

item.title: FBI arrests suspect in 2021 D.C. pipe bomb case, sources say
item.description: Sources say the FBI has arrested a man suspected of placing pipe bombs outside RNC and DNC headquarters on the eve of the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot.

item.title: Home prices could dip in 22 U.S. cities next year, report says. See where.
item.description: A new report from Realtor.com projects that the housing market will shift in a more buyer-friendly direction in 2026.

item.title: Oil, defence and geopolitics: Why Putin is visiting Modi in Delhi
item.description: BBC editors explain what is at stake as Russian President Vladimir Putin starts a two-day visit to India.

item.title: Israel says Palestinian groups returned body of Thai hostage held in Gaza
item.description: The remains of agricultural worker Suthisak Rintalak were recovered by Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad in northern Gaza.

item.title: Previously unseen images of Epstein's island released
item.description: The new images come as a deadline for the broader release of documents held by the US government looms.

item.title: Man charged in shooting death of Utah "No Kings" protester

item.title: Trump to host signing of peace deal between leaders of DR Congo and Rwanda
item.description: The US president hopes that a peace deal will pave the way for greater American investment in the resource-rich region.

item.title: A quiet corner of Arkansas has become a hot spot for US immigration crackdown, AP finds
Boat strike survivors were trying to climb back on before follow-up attack, source says
item.description: The White House confirmed this week that there was a second strike, but denied that Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth ordered it.

item.title: Ukraine and US negotiators to meet in Florida after Moscow talks, White House says
item.description: US special envoy Steve Witkoff will meet senior Ukrainian negotiator, Rustem Umerov, for talks in Miami on Thursday.

item.title: Should you open a Trump account for your child? Here's what experts say.
item.description: Trump accounts offer a new tax-preferred way for families to save money for their kids. Here are the pros and cons.

item.title: FBI makes arrest in investigation into pipe bombs placed in DC on eve of Jan. 6 riot, AP source says
item.description: The FBI has made an arrest in its nearly 5-year-old investigation into who placed pipe bombs in Washington before the Jan. 6, 2021, riot at the U.S. C...

item.title: President Trump’s contempt shocks the country’s largest Somali community
